biotools.summary: A computational method to study intercellular communication. It uses human or mouse gene expression data of interacting cells in order to predict ligand-receptor interactions that might drive gene expression changes in cells of interest.

bioschemas.name: NicheNet
bioschemas.summary: A computational method to study intercellular communication. It uses human or mouse gene expression data of interacting cells in order to predict ligand-receptor interactions that might drive gene expression changes in cells of interest.
